title: Disowned Ancestor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Black) each night.
- (Black): Choose a target, and redirect a random attacker against them to yourself.
- (Black)(1): Place a +1/+1 counter on yourself.

desc:
Post 806
*Long after death, the spirits of the Disowned continue to seek redemption among their Abzan kin.*
